reviews.subject: Biology
reviews.review: Dr. Chen's lectures are engaging and well-structured. She's always willing to help during office hours.

reviews.subject: History
reviews.review: Prof. Johnson knows his subject well, but his lectures can be dry at times. Assignments are fair.

reviews.subject: Computer Science
reviews.review: Brilliant professor! Dr. Williams explains complex concepts clearly and provides great real-world examples.

reviews.subject: Mathematics
reviews.review: Prof. Lee's teaching style is confusing. Often seems unprepared for class and struggles to answer questions.

reviews.subject: Psychology
reviews.review: Dr. Rodriguez is passionate about her field and it shows. Her classes are thought-provoking and interactive.

reviews.subject: English Literature
reviews.review: Prof. Taylor has extensive knowledge but can be intimidating. Grading is strict but fair.

reviews.subject: Chemistry
reviews.review: Dr. Brown is an exceptional teacher. Her labs are well-organized and she explains concepts clearly.

reviews.subject: Philosophy
reviews.review: Prof. Wilson often cancels classes and seems disinterested. Lectures are hard to follow and assignments are unclear.

reviews.subject: Economics
reviews.review: Dr. Martinez brings real-world experience to her classes. Her exams are challenging but fair.

reviews.subject: Physics
reviews.review: Prof. Anderson is knowledgeable but can be impatient with questions. His problem sets are very difficult.

reviews.subject: Sociology
reviews.review: Dr. White is inspiring and approachable. Her classes encourage critical thinking and open discussion.

reviews.subject: Art History
reviews.review: Prof. Davis seems knowledgeable but his lectures are disorganized and hard to follow.

reviews.subject: Environmental Science
reviews.review: Dr. Garcia is passionate about her subject and organizes interesting field trips. Assignments can be time-consuming.

reviews.subject: Political Science
reviews.review: Prof. Kim's lectures are informative but can be monotonous. He's helpful during office hours.

reviews.subject: Neuroscience
reviews.review: Dr. Green is an outstanding educator. Her classes are challenging but incredibly rewarding.

reviews.subject: Statistics
reviews.review: Prof. Miller often seems rushed and irritable. His explanations can be confusing and he's not very approachable.

reviews.subject: Anthropology
reviews.review: Dr. Thompson brings her field experience into the classroom, making lectures fascinating. Grading can be inconsistent.

reviews.subject: Business Administration
reviews.review: Prof. Clark has good industry connections but his teaching style is average. Group projects are well-structured.

reviews.subject: Linguistics
reviews.review: Dr. Turner is exceptional. Her classes are engaging, challenging, and she provides excellent feedback on assignments.

reviews.subject: Mechanical Engineering
reviews.review: Prof. Baker seems uninterested in teaching. Lectures are poorly prepared and he's rarely available for help.
